de.feu.showgo

Class ShowGoDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.feu.showgo.ShowGoDAO

  • public class ShowGoDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds one object of the ShowGo class that is used throughout the whole application. It also provides methods for saving the object to disc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShowGoDAO() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void autosave()
      This method saves the ShowGo singleton to .autosave.showgo in the users home directory.

      • getSaveFile

        public static java.io.File getSaveFile()
        Gets the save file.
        Returns:
        the save file

      • setSaveFile

        public static void setSaveFile(java.io.File saveFile)
        Setting the file to which the ShowGo singleton was saved last. It is NOT set automatically by saveToDisc. The information is used by the save action in the menu bar. If the save file exists, the user may save into it. If not, a file select dialog is displayed.
        Parameters:
        saveFile - the new save file

      • setShowGo

        public static void setShowGo(ShowGo showGo)
        Sets the ShowGo singleton.
        Parameters:
        showGo - the new show go

      • saveToDisc

        public static void saveToDisc(java.io.File file)
                       throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        This method saves the ShowGo singleton to the provided file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - the jAXB exception

      • autosave

        public static void autosave()
        This method saves the ShowGo singleton to .autosave.showgo in the users home directory.
